prod_desc: Airlift vital supplies with the awesome 3-in-1 Cargo Heli!
prod_long_desc:
Airlift heavy loads with the high-powered 3-in-1 Cargo Heli! Taxi to the helipad and prepare for takeoff. When you’re airborne, hover into position, lower the winch hook and carefully lift the cargo container. Features a smart red and yellow color scheme, working main rotor and tail rotor, 2 detailed engines, navigation lights, wheeled undercarriage, winch hook and a cargo container with opening doors. Now let’s get this cargo delivered! Rebuilds into a cool cargo ship or an awesome cargo plane.
Features a turning main rotor and tail rotor, 2 detailed engines, navigation lights, wheeled undercarriage, winch hook and a cargo container with opening doors
Check out the awesome red and yellow color scheme
Taxi to the runway
Lower the winch hook
Lift the cargo container
3-in-1 model: rebuilds into a cargo ship or a cargo plane
Cargo Heli measures over 2” high, 6” long and 5” wide
Cargo plane measures over 2” high, 4” long and 5” wide
Cargo ship measures over 1” high, 4” long and 1” wide
Combine with the 31027 LEGO® Creator Blue Racer and 31033 LEGO® Creator Vehicle Transporter for even more action
